code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import"../css/style.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[navActive,setNavActive]=useState(false);const[user,setUser]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const storedUser=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user"));setUser(storedUser);},[]);const toggleNav=()=>setNavActive(!navActive);const closeNav=()=>setNavActive(false);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar ".concat(navActive?"active":""),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hamburger",onClick:toggleNav,children:"\u2630"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"left-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:"Atelier Noir"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"nav-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",onClick:closeNav,children:"Po\u010Detna"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/o_nama",onClick:closeNav,children:"O nama"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/ponuda",onClick:closeNav,children:"Ponuda"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/kontakt",onClick:closeNav,children:"Kontakt"})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"auth-buttons",children:user?user.role==="admin"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/admin",onClick:closeNav,className:"btn",children:"Admin Panel"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/korpa",onClick:closeNav,className:"btn",children:"Korpa"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/log-in",onClick:closeNav,className:"btn",children:"Prijava"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/sign-up",onClick:closeNav,className:"btn",children:"Registracija"})]})})]});};export default Navbar;
